https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Hw5yZlPwgQvP1msYvCR44UgVrf.jpg Kochubaby, a blind man, falls in love with Mary, a blind orphan girl, and gets married to her. Unfortunately, Mary dies in an accident and Kochubaby struggles to look after their only daughter. Aathmakatha
